required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Trial of HR19042 Capsule in Healthy Chinese Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: Safety and Pharmacokinetics of HR19042 Capsule After Single Administration in Healthy Chinese Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: The study is being conducted to evaluate the safety and pharmacokinetics of HR19042 capsule after single administration in healthy Chinese subjects. To explore the pharmacokinetic characteristics and safety of HR19042 capsule in healthy Chinese subjects.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Single center, open, three-period, sequential design

primary_outcome.description: Peak concentration of drug observed from 0 hour to 24 hours after administration
The area under the drug concentration-time curve at the sample collection time t that can be accurately determined from 0 hour to 24 hours after administration
The area under the concentration-time curve of drug from 0 hour to infinity after administration

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Screening period to end of follow-up period, approximately 1 month

secondary_outcome.measure: the change of blood cortisol AUC0-24h from baseline after each cycle of administration
